title: CryptoBoursa
author: CryptoBoursa
content: Join the Revolution! Introducing Crypto Boursa Exchange and Token (CRB) – Unleash the Full Potential of Crypto Trading!Welcome to the future of cryptocurrency trading! Crypto Boursa Exchange and Token (CRB) is here to redefine the way you trade digital assets. Say goodbye to restrictions, delays, and high fees – we are breaking the barriers and putting you in control of your crypto journey!At Crypto Boursa, we believe in the power of freedom and accessibility. No more lengthy vendor applications or waiting periods – you can register and start trading immediately! Our cutting-edge platform offers a seamless Crypto Currency Exchange and Peer-to-Peer service, giving you unmatched versatility in your trading experience.With our brand new exchange, we are proud to offer the lowest fees on the market for both withdrawals and deposits, allowing you to maximize your returns. But that's not all – we have revolutionized the industry by eliminating trading fees entirely! Yes, you read it right, ZERO trading fees for a limited time period!As a special welcome for new users, we are thrilled to announce an exciting promotion! Upon registration, you will receive airdrops of Crypto Boursa tokens directly into your account when you deposit and trade. It's our way of saying thank you for joining us on this extraordinary journey!But that's just the beginning. We are not only an exchange; we are a platform dedicated to supporting and empowering other projects in the crypto space. We invite all visionary projects to list on our exchange, offering an irresistible discount promotion. Choose from as many pairs as you wish and get listed on both our exchange and our peer-to-peer service. Listing fees are not exaggerated like other exchanges for more information visit our website. It's an opportunity to showcase your project to our growing community and accelerate your success.Don't miss out on this golden opportunity to be part of the future of crypto trading. Join us today at Crypto Boursa Exchange and Token (CRB) and unlock a world of limitless possibilities. Together, let's embrace freedom, innovation, and unrivaled trading experiences!Register now at https://www.cryptoboursa.com and embark on an exhilarating journey with Crypto Boursa Exchange and Token (CRB). The future is here, and it's waiting for you!For more information visit our website or social media.Website: https://www.cryptoboursa.comEmail: info@cryptoboursa.comTelegram: https://t.me/CryptoBoursaGlobalInstagram: https://instagram.com/cryptoboursa?igshid=ZDdkNTZiNTM=

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Avoid this exchange.Why should anyone trust you? I can not see anywhere you are marketing your products and servicesI checked reviewing sites, no review about your exchangeYou are not even that old yet, but how come no one knows this exchange till now? No information on the internetQuoteDomain:cryptoboursa.comRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On:2023-01-10Expires On:2024-01-10Updated On:2023-03-17These are good exchanges: https://www.coingecko.com/en/exchanges

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: As you can see Op, bitcointalkers are not really fund of new exchanges so don't expect everyone to welcome you warmly to the forum. But if you really want to develop your exchange then you are sure going to receive lots of suggestions that will help you alot, but if your plan is to gain a little trust and then run away with users funds be rest assured that forum users will snuff it out before you even realize it.First of I'll start with the user interface, it's not really newbie friendly, and it also looks like those unknown exchanges that are been used by some shit coins. So you should try to improve it and make it more newbie friendly.And concerning the user verification, since it's still a pretty new sites I couldn't risk involving my funds in it, (registering an account with one of my emails is risk enough for me) I don't know if it's compulsory to undergo KYC before you can withdraw or partake in P2P trading. I don't know how this sounds but you should try to give new users a little less restrictions like allow them to trade at most $50 without having to complete verification, with that they can test the site. Alot of people prefer non-kyc site to KYCed sites.As you already know, you're in a very competitive industry and not just that, running an exchange requires that you gain the trust of your users since it involves them using their money and no one wants to give their money to an exchange that they know nothing about, so do well to promote it more and also interact with those that engage in your thread.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Is this the right place to announce about your exchange?Why don't you buy a copper member, create ann thread display your images since many people especially someone like me do find it difficult to click on a new site due to security reasons. So having image displayed on your post would also attributes in catching people's attention towards this post as I believe some reputable users may find it irrelevant.Then secondly, we believe the bull run is on its way whereby lot of people or do I say scammers do come to launch a fake project or exchange in other to get people invested in their project and trade in their exchange after the popularity has been gained they zoom off, causing heart attack to people who invested in such project.Lastly, I don't see anything convincing in your statement, there's nothing to assure traders funds are safe and secured.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP you are welcome to this platform. I can see you have a good project but you know you are not the first in the system as there are lots of exchanges out there contending with each other to remain relevant In the space.  Just as adbitco has said, you would need to upgrade your account by registering a copper member account so as to enable you upload graphics of your exchange and another this board is it the right place for this post as this is an exchange related topic.Nevertheless, for marketing, promoton and publicity, you will have to do a campaign here as your exchange have no strong publicity. Come to talk of it, you are new in the system so you would need guidance and I will advise you to seek a professional advice in the person of Royse777 for your promotional campaign here. He is vast and well experienced as a campaign manager. He has handled numerous successful projects onboard this platform.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoBoursa on July 17, 2023, 11:45:06 AMSay goodbye to restrictions, delays, and high fees – we are breaking the barriers and putting you in control of your crypto journey!Really?Says a damn centralized exchange that asks for KYC!QuoteWith our brand new exchange, we are proud to offer the lowest fees on the market for both withdrawals and deposits, allowing you to maximize your returns. But that's not all – we have revolutionized the industry by eliminating trading fees entirely! Withdrawal fee 0.01 BTCWhat a joke of an exchangeas if that's not enoughPrivacy policy: https://www.cryptoboursa.com/privacy-policyQuotecrypto_boursa Pvt Ltd is a company Incorporated in United Kingdom, and operates the website www.crypto_boursa.com and related mobile applications, an overall platform (hereinafter referred to as the 'Platform') dedicated to digital assets-only transaction and the provision of related services.So the company is incorporated in the UK, but it has a number from Kuwait! "+965-50681181"

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: You claim to be the premier Kuwaiti cryptocurrency exchangeBut checking on the internet I cannot find any reference that points that your platform is indeed the premier Kuwaiti cryptocurrency exchange, if you're platform claims to be the premier Kuwaiti cryptocurrency exchange, there should be articles and certifications coming from Kuwait media or government agencies but there are none.Everything I read about the description of your platform is all shill and hype marketing, people are better trading on stable and established exchanges than on your platform.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on July 17, 2023, 08:53:50 PMJust as adbitco has said, you would need to upgrade your account by registering a copper member account so as to enable you upload graphics of your exchange and another this board is it the right place for this post as this is an exchange related topic.From the investigation by Bitcoin_Arena this exchange has shown to be fake exchange claiming what they aren't. I don't think there should be any need for people to start using that exchange as compared to their withdrawal fee to be 0.01BTC is this a joke or what, do we say is an error from their ends as I believe no exchange in this crypto space would change such huge amount for just withdrawing from their exchange.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoBoursa on July 17, 2023, 11:45:06 AMIt's an opportunity to showcase your project to our growing community and accelerate your success.Who are you? There is no information on the site about you or any team, or community behind.Quote from: CryptSafe on July 17, 2023, 08:53:50 PMOP you are welcome to this platform. I can see you have a good project but you know you are not the first in the system as there are lots of exchanges out there contending with each other to remain relevant In the space.  Just as adbitco has said, you would need to upgrade your account by registering a copper member account so as to enable you upload graphics of your exchange and another this board is it the right place for this post as this is an exchange related topic.I suggest you take a closer look at what it's all about, not just fill in the signature post quote. The OP did not even indicate in a single word that he was interested in any higher-quality performance on the forum. Plus it is obvious that it is a scam.Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 17, 2023, 11:17:43 PMQuotecrypto_boursa Pvt Ltd is a company Incorporated in United Kingdom, and operates the website www.crypto_boursa.com and related mobile applications, an overall platform (hereinafter referred to as the 'Platform') dedicated to digital assets-only transaction and the provision of related services.So the company is incorporated in the UK, but it has a number from Kuwait! "+965-50681181"Offshore company registered for around £50. The cheapest option for scammers to "legalize" their business. For example link

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 17, 2023, 11:17:43 PMQuote from: CryptoBoursa on July 17, 2023, 11:45:06 AMSay goodbye to restrictions, delays, and high fees – we are breaking the barriers and putting you in control of your crypto journey!Really?Says a damn centralized exchange that asks for KYC!QuoteWith our brand new exchange, we are proud to offer the lowest fees on the market for both withdrawals and deposits, allowing you to maximize your returns. But that's not all – we have revolutionized the industry by eliminating trading fees entirely! Withdrawal fee 0.01 BTCWhat a joke of an exchangeas if that's not enoughPrivacy policy: https://www.cryptoboursa.com/privacy-policyQuotecrypto_boursa Pvt Ltd is a company Incorporated in United Kingdom, and operates the website www.crypto_boursa.com and related mobile applications, an overall platform (hereinafter referred to as the 'Platform') dedicated to digital assets-only transaction and the provision of related services.So the company is incorporated in the UK, but it has a number from Kuwait! "+965-50681181"What a good catch! seems they are one of those scammers out there looking for people's hard-earned resources to make away with. It is nice all these are fast revealed so as to keep members in the know of their possible act in time. How can they say a low fee and be charging 0.01 btc that's an exorbitant fee from a self-claimed exchange and not to talk of the lie they have made public with respect to their location and registration. Were they trying to divert the attention of the public from their origin or what?They started on the wrong note and if at all they have good intentions, they already shot themselves in the foot because of the silly mistakes they have committed.
